definition

Incompatibilism - Definition

the belief that free will and determinism are mutually exclusive.

both free will libertarianism and hard determinism are incompatibilist views.

see also

  • Hard Determinism - Definition
  • Compatibilism - Definition
  • Free Will Libertarianism - Definition
